resources.string: It is an invalid destination.\nYou cannot reach this destination by driving.\nPick a valid destination
Your internet connection is not working.\nCannot use the application without internet.\nCheck your internet connectivity
You need a to turn on GPS to start this application.\nPlease turn on GPS Service in Settings
You need a to turn on Location Services to use this application.\nPlease turn on Location Service in Settings
You need a network connection to use this application.\nPlease turn on mobile network or Wi-Fi in Settings

You have two possible ways to provide the destination.

 1) Enter your destination (in your country) and search to find list of possible destinations.
Then you can also verify the location on Google Maps.

 2) Click on the icon just before the textbox or PRESS and HOLD the text box to open google maps and point your destination by placing the MARKER over your destination point on the map and TAP on the description showing over the marker. You can MOVE/DRAG the marker by PRESS and HOLD the marker and then move.
This application helps you to find your destination and once you started tracking service, it will track your travelling path and alert your guardian
